text: |CAZ Centres||Clusters within the Central Activities Zone (CAZ) that are predominantly retail or leisure focused and act as town centres.| |Circular economy||An economic model in which resources are kept in use at the highest level possible for as long as possible in order to maximise value and reduce waste, moving away from the traditional linear economic model of ‘make, use, dispose’.| |Code of Construction Practice|CoCP|A guidance document setting out relevant legislation, linkages to the Local Plan, key actions to be undertaken by developers (regarding planning submissions and license applications) and encouraging the use of best practice environmental and safety related mitigations while planning and managing demolition and construction works within the borough.|
